Class Auction_Server_Replica

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgroups.ReceiverAdapter
      • Auction_Server_Replica
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jgroups.MembershipListener, org.jgroups.MessageListener, org.jgroups.Receiver

    public class Auction_Server_Replica
extends org.jgroups.ReceiverAdapter
    This class represents the claster members that are serving the requests coming from the server

      • createAction

        public java.lang.String createAction(java.lang.String itemDesc,
                                     java.math.BigDecimal reservedPrice,
                                     java.math.BigDecimal startingPrice,
                                     java.lang.String sellerID)
        This method creates a new action, updates the state of the data and returns the new auctionID to the server.
        Parameters:
        itemDesc - A small description of the item to sold
        startingPrice - The starting price of the item
        reservedPrice - The minimum accepted price for an item
        Returns:
        auctionID that will be used to bid for that specific item

      • closeAuction1

        public int closeAuction1(java.lang.String auctionID,
                         java.lang.String sellerID)
        This method tries to close an auction If succeed updates the state.
        Parameters:
        auctionID - The ID of the auction to be closed
        Returns:
        true if the auction exists otherwise it returns false

      • serverAuthentication1

        public AuthenticationReply serverAuthentication1(java.lang.String key,
                                                 int randomNum)
        Server get the random number, retireves the key from the file and encrypts the number using the key
        Parameters:
        key - The key generated from the password in the file
        randomNum - the challenge of the client for the server
        Returns:
        Authentication reply-> server's challenge for the client and his challenge solved
